question: He wants to get a better ______ and earn more money.
Managers set objectives, and decide ______ their organization can achieve them.
Obviously, objectives occasionally ______ be modified or changed.
Managers who are ambitious are ____________ -oriented managers.
You won’t be allowed into the club ______ you wear a suit and tie.
We haven’t had ______ news from our agent.
I’ve lost my keys. I can’t find them ______.
I haven’t seen your cousin _____ ages.
We'll never get to the airport! There is ______ time!
When do we use the Simple Past?
answers: series of completed actions in the past
for something that started in the past and continues in the present
rightAnswer: series of completed actions in the past
